16/**
17 * @file
18 * @brief Header of the semver::version class.
19 *
20 * This header defines the semver::version class, the central type of the C++
21 * API of `libsemver` library.
22 *
23 * @copyright Copyright (c) 2016 Enrico M. Crisostomo
24 * @license GNU General Public License v. 3.0
25 * @author Enrico M. Crisostomo
26 * @version 1.0.0
27 */
28#ifndef SEMVER_UTILS_VERSION_H
29#define SEMVER_UTILS_VERSION_H
30
31#include <vector>
32#include <string>
33
34#pragma clang diagnostic push
35#pragma ide diagnostic ignored "OCUnusedGlobalDeclarationInspection"
36
37/**
38 * @brief Main namespace of `libsemver`.
39 */
40namespace semver
41{
42 /**
43 * @brief Class that represents a prerelease identifier.
44 *
45 * This class represents a prerelease identifier complying with _Semantic
46 * Versioning_ 2.0.0 (http://semver.org/).
47 */
48 class prerelease_component
49 {
50 private:
51 /**
52 * @brief Indicates whether the component is a number.
53 */
54 bool is_number;
55
56 /**
57 * @brief The component representation as a string.
58 */
59 std::string identifier;
60
61 /**
62 * @brief The component numeric value.
63 *
64 * This field is meaningful only if the current component is a number.
65 */
66 unsigned long value_as_number;
67
68 public:
69 prerelease_component(std::string s);
70 bool operator<(const prerelease_component& rh) const;
71 bool operator>(const prerelease_component& rh) const;
72 bool operator==(const prerelease_component& v) const;
73 };
74
75 /**
76 * @brief Class that represents a version number.
77 *
78 * This class represents a version number complying with _Semantic Versioning_
79 * 2.0.0 (http://semver.org/). As a supported extension this class allows
80 * version numbers to contain any number of components greater than 2.
81 *
82 * Instances of this class are designed to be immutable.
83 */
84 class version
85 {
86 private:
87 std::vector<unsigned int> versions;
88 std::string prerelease;
89 std::vector<prerelease_component> prerelease_comp;
90 std::string metadata;
91
92 void parse_prerelease();
93
94 public:
95 /**
96 * @brief Constructs a semver::version instance from a std::string.
97 *
98 * The version number @p v must comply with _Semantic Versioning 2.0.0_. As
99 * a supported extension this class allows version numbers to contain any
100 * number of components greater than 2.
101 *
102 * @param v The version number to parse.
103 * @return A semver::version instance.
104 * @throws std::invalid_argument if @p v is not a valid version number.
105 */
106 static version from_string(std::string v);
107
108 /**
109 * @brief Constructs a semver::version instance with the specified
110 * parameters. The parameters must comply with _Semantic Versioning 2.0.0_.
111 *
112 * @param versions The version components. As a supported extension this
113 * class allows versions numbers to contain any number of components greater
114 * than 2.
115 * @param prerelease An optional prerelease string.
116 * @param metadata An optional metadata string.
117 * @return A semver::version instance.
118 * @throws std::invalid_argument if the parameters do not comply with
119 * _Semantic Versioning 2.0.0_.
120 */
121 version(std::vector<unsigned int> versions,
122 std::string prerelease = "",
123 std::string metadata = "");
124
125 /**
126 * @brief Converts a version to its string representation.
127 *
128 * @return The string representation of this instance.
129 */
130 std::string str() const;
131
132 /**
133 * @brief Gets the version components.
134 *
135 * @return The version components.
136 */
137 std::vector<unsigned int> get_version() const;
138
139 /**
140 * @brief Gets the specified version component.
141 *
142 * @return The specified version component, or 0 if the specified @p index
143 * does not exist.
144 */
145 unsigned int get_version(unsigned int index) const;
146
147 /**
148 * @brief Gets the prerelease string.
149 *
150 * @return The prerelease string.
151 */
152 std::string get_prerelease() const;
153
154 /**
155 * @brief Gets the metadata string.
156 *
157 * @return The metadata string.
158 */
159 std::string get_metadata() const;
160
161 /**
162 * @brief Bumps the major version component.
163 *
164 * This method uses ::bump();
165 *
166 * @return A semver::version object containing the bumped version.
167 */
168 version bump_major() const;
169
170 /**
171 * @brief Bumps the minor version component.
172 *
173 * This method uses ::bump();
174 *
175 * @return A semver::version object representing the bumped version.
176 */
177 version bump_minor() const;
178
179 /**
180 * @brief Bumps the patch version component.
181 *
182 * This method uses ::bump();
183 *
184 * @return A semver::version object representing the bumped version.
185 */
186 version bump_patch() const;
187
188 /**
189 * @brief Bumps the specified version component.
190 *
191 * The component @p index is bumped and all components whose index is grater
192 * than @p index are set to 0. If @p index is greater than the current size
193 * `s` of the version number, then `index + 1 - s` components are added and
194 * set to 0.
195 *
196 * @return A semver::version object representing the bumped version.
197 */
198 version bump(unsigned int index) const;
199
200 /**
201 * @brief Strips the prerelease component.
202 *
203 * @return A semver::version object representing the modified version.
204 */
205 version strip_prerelease() const;
206
207 /**
208 * @brief Strips the metadata component.
209 *
210 * @return A semver::version object representing the modified version.
211 */
212 version strip_metadata() const;
213
214 /**
215 * @brief Checks whether the instance is a release version.
216 *
217 * @return `true` if the instance represents a release version, `false`
218 * otherwise.
219 */
220 bool is_release() const;
221
222 /**
223 * @brief Checks two instances for equality.
224 *
225 * Two instances are equal if and only if all its components are equal.
226 *
227 * @param v The instance to be compared with.
228 * @return `true` if @p rh is equal to this instance, `false` otherwise.
229 */
230 bool operator==(const version& rh) const;
231
232 /**
233 * @brief Compares two instances.
234 *
235 * An instance is less than another if its version number is less than the
236 * other's. Components are compared one by one, starting from the first.
237 * If the two components are equal, then the following component is
238 * considered. If the first component is less than the second, then `true`
239 * is returned, otherwise `false` is returned.
240 *
241 * @param v The instance to be compared with.
242 * @return `true` if this instance is less than @p rh, `false` otherwise.
243 */
244 bool operator<(const version& rh) const;
245
246 /**
247 * @brief Compares two instances.
248 *
249 * An instance is greater than another if its version number is less than
250 * the other's. Components are compared one by one, starting from the
251 * first. If the two components are equal, then the following component is
252 * considered. If the first component is greater than the second, then
253 * `true` is returned, otherwise `false` is returned.
254 *
255 * @param v The instance to be compared with.
256 * @return `true` if this instance is greater than @p rh, `false` otherwise.
257 */
258 bool operator>(const version& rh) const;
259 };
260}
261
262#endif // SEMVER_UTILS_VERSION_H
263
264#pragma clang diagnostic pop
